articles.author: CBS New York Team
articles.title: American Dream mall evacuated on Black Friday as police investigate bomb threat, Gov. Phil Murphy says - CBS News
articles.description: People in the area received emergency alerts on their phones saying to use the nearest exits and to avoid elevators.
articles.content:
EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. -- The American Dream mall in East Rutherford, New Jersey was evacuated on Black Friday, as state police investigated a bomb threat. 
Shoppers were allowed back inside roughly … [+928 chars]
